sentences: The sun rises in the east.
She loves to read mystery novels.
A cat was sleeping on the windowsill.
He enjoys hiking in the mountains.
The coffee shop opens at 7 AM.
They watched a movie last night.
Rainy days make me feel nostalgic.
The child laughed at the funny clown.
He forgot his umbrella at home.
The dog barked loudly at strangers.
They are planning a trip to Europe.
A bird built a nest in the tree.
He writes poems in his free time.
The stars shined brightly in the sky.
